# Changelog
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## [0.2.0] - 2022-02-05

### Features

- Added example using Pascal code from cc_binary rule

### Miscellaneous Tasks

- Updated copyright year in LICENSE

- Upgrade to Bazel 5

## [0.1.0] - 2021-12-12

### Features

- Adding Vagrantfile
- Introducing git-cliff

- Implemented Windows support
- Implemented stardoc
